english.segment1: I'm the desperate. And your the savior
english.segment2: There's been something else. Talkin' in my ear. Someone save me. When I speak. It begins to decay. I'm not about to bury myself. Oh God, my hands are shaking again. Calm down
english.segment3: Now I can't feel the floor. And my vision takes it's toll on me
english.segment4: Oh, God it's racing through my veins. I'm afraid there must be some kinda mistake. Oh, I'm in over my head again. Reach in and grab a hold of me. I'm so scared that I've started to slip. They say that I'll never change. I'll prove 'em wrong
english.segment6: I hear the calling but it's passing through. Clean me up, show me how to live
english.segment7: Tear me down. Let me start again
